solution.text:
The first Installment of INR _{p}_ can be considered as the first term of the A.P. \(a_1 = _{p}_\)
Increment in the installment is the common difference \(d=_{q}_\)
n=_{r}_
The answer could be found using \(n^{th}\) formula
\(a_n=a_1+(n-1)\times d\)

content.text: A man starts repaying a loan as first installment of INR _{p}_ . If he increases the installment by INR _{q}_ every month, what amount will he pay in the \(_{r}_ ^{th}\) installment?
